briefTitle: Phase III Study of RAD001 Adjuvant Therapy in Poor Risk Patients With Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (DLBCL) of RAD001 Versus Matching Placebo After Patients Have Achieved Complete Response With First-line Rituximab-chemotherapy
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multi-center Phase III Study of RAD001 Adjuvant Therapy in Poor Risk Patients With Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (DLBCL) of RAD001 Versus Matching Placebo After Patients Have Achieved Complete Response With First-line Rituximab-chemotherapy
summary: Phase III study of RAD001 adjuvant therapy in poor risk patients with Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (DLBCL) of RAD001 versus matching placebo after patients had achieved complete response with first-line rituximab-chemotherapy

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From date of randomization to the date of event defined as the first documented recurrence of the disease, or death due to any cause and up to 6 years
